title: The Queen's Corgi
creator_credit: nWave Pictures, Belga Productions, Ben Stassen, John R. Smith, Rob Sprackling, Caroline Van Iseghem and Vincent Kesteloot
brief_description: When the Queen’s favourite dog, Rex, becomes lost, he must make new friends and embrace new adventures in order to find his way back to the palace.

constellations_other.name: Royalty, royalty, royalty
constellations_other.description: Fascination with the royal family has persisted over the years, as seen through newsreels, documentaries, films, TV shows, tabloid news and satire.

creator_credit_for_label: nWave Pictures, Belga Productions, Ben Stassen, John R. Smith, Rob Sprackling, Caroline Van Iseghem and Vincent Kesteloot
description: Since his arrival at Buckingham palace, Rex lives a life of luxury. Top dog, he has superseded his three fellow Corgis in Her Majesty’s heart. His arrogance can be quite irritating. When he causes a diplomatic incident during an official dinner with the President of the United States, he falls into disgrace. Betrayed by one of his peers, Rex becomes a stray dog in the streets of London. How can he redeem himself? In love, he will find the resources to surpass himself in the face of great danger…
